data.title: 中央研究院植物暨微生物學研究所
data.text:
Time

Taipei: 14:00-15:40, Monday, October 29, 2018

Tainan: 14:00-15:40, Tuesday, October 30, 2018

Venue

Taipei(October 29): International Conference Lecture Hall, Humanities and Social Science Building, Academia Sinica, Taipei, Taiwan

Tainan(October 30): Shang-Fa Yang Auditorium, Academia Sinica Biotechnology Center in Southern Taiwan

Speaker

Professor David Baulcombe (Regius Professor of Botany, Royal Society Research Professor, Department of Plant Sciences, University of Cambridge, UK)

Your attendance to the event will be cordially welcome.(No registration required)

For more information, please see the poster attached.
